stories.text:
Been sick and watching this show. It's fun. Just curious, they talk about valuation, sales the various aspects of ramping up manufacturing, distribution marketing.

First question: Is there a name for academic discipline containing the various topics above?

Second: Any good books in that space?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best books about the stuff they talk about on Shark Tank?
Fossilised ‘sea dragon’ found in Rutland reservoir

Anime4K: Real time high quality video upscaling

stories.text:
I've had a phone for a few years, and it hasn't been mistreated. Almost every morning I go to unplug my charger cable and it either fell out during the night or is so low that it falls it when I pick up the phone. There is no debris in the port. I've never had this problem with any older USB port (although I have had to clear debris once or twice).

It really sucks that this phone is perfect apart from the charger port
stories.title: Ask HN: Are USB-C ports less durable than micro USB?
UK supermarket scraps 'use by' date for fresh milk, replaced with 'best before'

stories.text: Most of the 3rd party antivirus software tend to slow down computer systems. Is windows defender alone enough to keep the windows systems protected or do the antivirus software actually have a bold stand?
stories.title: Antivirus or Windows Defender?
